attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that any qualified driver who reaches the age of 65 years and wishes to continue driving should undergo a medical examination on their birthday and every year after that to confirm they are still medically fit to drive.  The costs of these tests should be borne by the public purse on the grounds of keeping the public safe from drivers who can no longer see.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many cases of older drivers being found incapable of safe driving for various reasons - after they have killed somebody!  The public must be protected from the actions of these people and must be prepared to pay for it, to stop themselves being killed.
